statements: SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, student_id, completion_status FROM assignments;
SELECT assignment_name, student_id, completion_status, assignment_id FROM assignments;
SELECT student_id, completion_status, assignment_name, assignment_id FROM assignments;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT assignment_name, completion_status FROM assignments WHERE assignment_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY assignment_id DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, completion_status FROM assignments WHERE student_id = 2 AND completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name FROM assignments WHERE completion_status = FALSE ORDER BY assignment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE student_id = 3 AND completion_status = FALSE ORDER BY assignment_name DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, completion_status FROM assignments WHERE student_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM assignments;
SELECT title, deadline FROM assignments ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT id, title, completion_status FROM projects WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT title, deadline FROM assignments WHERE deadline < '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, title FROM projects WHERE completion_status = FALSE ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT title, CASE WHEN completion_status THEN 'Completed' ELSE 'Pending' END AS status FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT assignment_name, student_id FROM assignments ORDER BY assignment_id DESC
SELECT project_name FROM projects WHERE student_id = 123456
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_progress WHERE total_assignments > 10
SELECT student_id, assignments_completed, projects_completed FROM student_progress
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, completion_status FROM assignments WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY assignment_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT project_name, completion_status FROM projects WHERE student_id = 456 AND completion_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE total_assignments > 10 AND total_projects > 5
SELECT assignment_name AS task_name, student_id, completion_status FROM assignments WHERE completion_status = FALSE ORDER BY student_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT student_id, SUM(assignments_completed) AS total_assignments_completed FROM student_progress GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_assignments_completed > 20
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM Projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name FROM Assignments WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS num_assignments FROM ProgressTracking GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM Assignments;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date, completion_status FROM Assignments WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT assignment_id, student_id, progress_percentage FROM ProgressTracking WHERE tracking_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT assignment_name, completion_status FROM Assignments;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, completion_status FROM Projects WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT assignment_name, student_name, progress_rating FROM AssignmentsProgress JOIN Students ON AssignmentsProgress.student_id = Students.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Assignments;
SELECT student_id, assignment_name FROM Assignments ORDER BY assignment_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, project_name FROM Students JOIN Projects ON Students.student_id = Projects.student_id;
SELECT project_name, student_name FROM Projects JOIN Students ON Projects.student_id = Students.student_id WHERE Projects.completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, completion_date FROM Students JOIN AssignmentsProgress ON Students.student_id = AssignmentsProgress.student_id ORDER BY AssignmentsProgress.completion_date ASC;
